heroTitle: Explore the majestic Peruvian Andes with Peru Excursions
heroSubtitle: Trek through ancient trails, uncover hidden gems, and immerse yourself in a journey of a lifetime. Start your adventure today.
emailSuccessDescription: Thank you for your message. I'll get back to you within 24 hours!
emailErrorDescription: There was an error sending your message. Please try WhatsApp instead.
contactDescription: Ready to start your Peruvian adventure? Send me a message or contact me directly via WhatsApp.
toursDescription: Discover our amazing tours in Peru. From trekking adventures to cultural experiences, find the perfect tour for your next adventure.
tryDifferentFilters: Try adjusting your filters to see more results
readyForAdventureText: Let's create an unforgettable Peruvian experience tailored just for you.
destinationsDescription: Discover the most beautiful destinations in Peru. From ancient citadels to colorful mountains, explore the wonders of the Andes.
planYourJourneyText: Ready to explore these incredible destinations? Let's create the perfect itinerary for your Peruvian adventure.
customTourDescription: Tell me about your dream Peru adventure and I'll create a personalized itinerary just for you. Every detail tailored to your interests, fitness level, and budget.
responseTime: I'll respond within 24 hours with a personalized itinerary proposal
customRequestSuccess: Thank you! I'll create a personalized itinerary and send it to you within 24 hours.
customRequestErrorDescription: There was an error sending your request. Please try WhatsApp instead.
